In his trial opening, @RepAdamSchiff argued:
The Framers put impeachment in the Constitution as a check on a President who abuses power.
Trump abused his power by pressuring Ukraine to aid his re-election.
This is a threat to our national security & democracy.

text: The rules that Senator McConnell & the Republicans rammed through the Senate tonight are designed to protect President Trump – not guarantee a fair & honest impeachment trial. The rules are rigged.
text_html: The rules that Senator McConnell & the Republicans rammed through the Senate tonight are designed to protect President Trump – not guarantee a fair & honest impeachment trial. The rules are rigged.

text: Sen. Schumer’s 11th amendment allows Chief Justice Roberts – a neutral party – to approve witnesses & evidence that are relevant to the impeachment charges.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s 11th amendment allows Chief Justice Roberts – a neutral party – to approve witnesses & evidence that are relevant to the impeachment charges.

text: Senator Schumer’s tenth amendment gives each side 24 hours to respond to written motions – not 2 hours as provided in Senator McConnell’s rules. This should be simple – people should have time to read what they're responding to.
text_html: Senator Schumer’s tenth amendment gives each side 24 hours to respond to written motions – not 2 hours as provided in Senator McConnell’s rules. This should be simple – people should have time to read what they're responding to.

text: Senator Schumer’s ninth amendment eliminates an obstacle in Senator McConnell's rules and provides a vote on any motion to subpoena witnesses & documents after the impeachment trial question period. No further debates needed.
text_html: Senator Schumer’s ninth amendment eliminates an obstacle in Senator McConnell's rules and provides a vote on any motion to subpoena witnesses & documents after the impeachment trial question period. No further debates needed.

text: Sen. Schumer’s eighth amendment will subpoena former National Security Advisor John Bolton, who has already said that he’s willing to testify about the “many relevant meetings & conversations” he knew about relating to Ukraine. McConnell should let him testify in the Senate.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s eighth amendment will subpoena former National Security Advisor John Bolton, who has already said that he’s willing to testify about the “many relevant meetings & conversations” he knew about relating to Ukraine. McConnell should let him testify in the Senate.

text: Sen. Schumer's seventh amendment is short but important: the President doesn't get to pick & choose which evidence he provides to the Senate. If he wants docs admitted, he must turn over everything asked for in the subpoena. This helps prevent selective admission of evidence.
text_html: Sen. Schumer's seventh amendment is short but important: the President doesn't get to pick & choose which evidence he provides to the Senate. If he wants docs admitted, he must turn over everything asked for in the subpoena. This helps prevent selective admission of evidence.

text: Sen. Schumer’s sixth amendment will subpoena Robert Blair, an advisor to acting WH Chief of Staff Mulvaney, who was on the line during President Trump’s July call with the Ukrainian President. He refused to testify in the House. He should testify in the Senate trial.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s sixth amendment will subpoena Robert Blair, an advisor to acting WH Chief of Staff Mulvaney, who was on the line during President Trump’s July call with the Ukrainian President. He refused to testify in the House. He should testify in the Senate trial.

text: Let’s be clear: we wouldn’t be holding amendment votes at 10pm if Senator McConnell and the Senate Republicans weren’t rigging the rules of this impeachment trial.
text_html: Let’s be clear: we wouldn’t be holding amendment votes at 10pm if Senator McConnell and the Senate Republicans weren’t rigging the rules of this impeachment trial.

text: Sen. Schumer’s fifth amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the Department of Defense” related to Ukraine. We should see all evidence of the orders that the Pentagon received to freeze Ukraine's aid.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s fifth amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the Department of Defense” related to Ukraine. We should see all evidence of the orders that the Pentagon received to freeze Ukraine's aid.

text: As Senators, we took an oath to do impartial justice, but Majority Leader McConnell is setting up a trial without critical documents and relevant witnesses. It is not our job to support and defend President Trump, our job is to support and defend the Constitution.
text_html: As Senators, we took an oath to do impartial justice, but Majority Leader McConnell is setting up a trial without critical documents and relevant witnesses. It is not our job to support and defend President Trump, our job is to support and defend the Constitution.

text: Sen. Schumer’s fourth amendment will subpoena acting WH Chief of Staff Mick Mulvaney. Several officials testified that Mulvaney organized & carried out the President’s request to withhold aid from Ukraine over the investigation of his political opponents. Mulvaney should testify.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s fourth amendment will subpoena acting WH Chief of Staff Mick Mulvaney. Several officials testified that Mulvaney organized & carried out the President’s request to withhold aid from Ukraine over the investigation of his political opponents. Mulvaney should testify.

text:
After 3 amendments, every GOP senator has voted:
No on subpoenas for White House documents
No on subpoenas for State Dept documents
 No on subpoenas for OMB documents
This is a sham trial.
text_html: After 3 amendments, every GOP senator has voted: No on subpoenas for White House documents No on subpoenas for State Dept documents No on subpoenas for OMB documents This is a sham trial.

text: Sen. Schumer’s third amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the Office of Management and Budget” related to Ukraine. An OMB official told the Pentagon to hold Ukraine's aid – we need that evidence.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s third amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the Office of Management and Budget” related to Ukraine. An OMB official told the Pentagon to hold Ukraine's aid – we need that evidence.

text: So here’s where we are: the Senate GOP won’t subpoena documents from the White House – and won’t subpoena documents from the State Department. If they truly believe in a fair impeachment trial, why are they hiding evidence?
text_html: So here’s where we are: the Senate GOP won’t subpoena documents from the White House – and won’t subpoena documents from the State Department. If they truly believe in a fair impeachment trial, why are they hiding evidence?

text:
This resolution doesn’t accomplish its one goal: to provide a fair, impartial trial for all sides & the American people.
 
We must see all of the relevant documents & hear from all of the relevant witnesses—that vote must happen now. Nothing less will get us to the truth we seek.
text_html: This resolution doesn’t accomplish its one goal: to provide a fair, impartial trial for all sides & the American people. We must see all of the relevant documents & hear from all of the relevant witnesses—that vote must happen now. Nothing less will get us to the truth we seek.

text: Sen. Schumer’s second amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the Department of State” related to Ukraine. Once again, the @SenateGOP should stop aiding the President’s obstruction of justice.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s second amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the Department of State” related to Ukraine. Once again, the @SenateGOP should stop aiding the President’s obstruction of justice.

text: A trial without all of the evidence isn't a trial – it's a cover-up.
text_html: A trial without all of the evidence isn't a trial – it's a cover-up.

text:
I just took the floor to demand a vote to subpoena the witnesses and documents needed for a fair trial.

Will Senate Republicans vote for a fair trial?

Or will they enable a cover-up?
text_html: I just took the floor to demand a vote to subpoena the witnesses and documents needed for a fair trial. Will Senate Republicans vote for a fair trial? Or will they enable a cover-up?

text: Sen. Schumer’s first amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the White House” related to Ukraine. The @SenateGOP must stop helping the President obstruct justice & bring those documents to the Senate.
text_html: Sen. Schumer’s first amendment will subpoena “all documents, communications, and other records within the possession, custody, or control of the White House” related to Ukraine. The @SenateGOP must stop helping the President obstruct justice & bring those documents to the Senate.

text: We need to hear from Mick Mulvaney. We need to hear from John Bolton. And we need to hear from those who helped Trump break the law by withholding military aid to Ukraine: Michael Duffey and Robert Blair. Every one of them must testify in Trump’s impeachment trial.
text_html: We need to hear from Mick Mulvaney. We need to hear from John Bolton. And we need to hear from those who helped Trump break the law by withholding military aid to Ukraine: Michael Duffey and Robert Blair. Every one of them must testify in Trump’s impeachment trial.

text: Senator McConnell’s rules for the impeachment trial don’t guarantee votes on witnesses or documents after the arguments are heard. We need those votes now, at the beginning of the trial.
text_html: Senator McConnell’s rules for the impeachment trial don’t guarantee votes on witnesses or documents after the arguments are heard. We need those votes now, at the beginning of the trial.

text:
Most of us don’t think twice about being able to shop online, but thousands of Americans still lack access to basic internet.

Without internet, rural residents can’t access education, jobs, health care, or #CyberMonday deals.

It’s time to bring internet to ALL Americans.
text_html: Most of us don’t think twice about being able to shop online, but thousands of Americans still lack access to basic internet. Without internet, rural residents can’t access education, jobs, health care, or #CyberMonday deals. It’s time to bring internet to ALL Americans.

text:
As we mourned the 20 lives lost after one hate-filled massacre in El Paso, more innocent Americans were murdered in Dayton.

The same hate-fueled gun violence in El Paso is what killed my son in 2012.

MLK said only love can drive out hate. We must act now to save American lives.
